video.title: Peg + Cat
video.synopsis: Peg and Cat are presented with really big outrageous problems, yet the loony pair can always rely on their math skills and imagination to solve them.

episodes.synopsis: Peg and Cat shoo 100 chickens back into a coop before the farmer realizes they're out; Peg and Cat move 100 chickens from Big Mouth to a spaceship.
episodes.title: The Chicken Problem / The Space Creature Problem

episodes.synopsis: Peg and Cat teach hungry pirates how to share fruit; Peg and Cat teach pirates how to fall asleep by counting chickens.
episodes.title: The Pirate Problem / The Sleepover Problem

episodes.synopsis: Peg and Cat form a supergroup that includes the Three Bears, Three Little Pigs and more; Peg and Cat think the Giants want to eat them for lunch.
episodes.title: The Three Bears Problem / The Giant Problem

episodes.synopsis: Peg and Cat join a circus; Peg and Cat use a measuring stick to find buried treasure.
episodes.title: The Circus Problem / The Buried Treasure Problem

episodes.synopsis: Cat gets stuck in a tree, and Peg must rescue him; Cat gets stuck in a tree again, and Peg must figure out a different way to get him down.
episodes.title: The Tree Problem / Another Tree Problem

episodes.synopsis: Peg and Cat clean Peg's messy room; Peg and Cat search for Mermaid's golden pyramids.
episodes.title: The Messy Room Problem / The Golden Pyramid Problem

episodes.synopsis: Peg and Cat clean up the park for the nursery school's Halloween parade; Peg and Cat are pursued by a metal monster while trick-or-treating.
episodes.title: The Parade Problem / The Halloween Problem

episodes.synopsis: Peg and Cat become lost while riding dinosaurs through a prehistoric forest; Peg and Cat help Beethoven write a symphony.
episodes.title: The Dinosaur Problem / The Beethoven Problem

episodes.synopsis: Peg and Cat need the 3 Bees to produce honey so that they can make a honey cake; Peg and Cat coach skiing penguins.
episodes.title: The Honey Problem / The Penguin Problem

episodes.synopsis: Peg and Cat rebuild their Hot Buttered Lightnin' car to compete in a big race; Peg and Cat search for the other members of their Electric Eleven band.
episodes.title: The Race Car Problem / The Big Gig Problem

episodes.synopsis: Peg and Cat need help cleaning filthy farm animals; Peg and Cat collect 30 rocks to give to Peg's mom on her 30th birthday.
episodes.title: The Slop Problem / The Birthday Present Problem

episodes.synopsis: Peg and Cat rescue Baby Fox from his elaborate block tower; Peg and Cat search for a missing wizard in a magical forest.
episodes.title: The Baby Problem / The Sparkling Sphere Problem

episodes.synopsis: Peg and Cat make a birthday cake for Jonah and his friends; Peg and Cat reassemble their smashed spaceship.
episodes.title: The Birthday Cake Problem / the Doohickey Problem

episodes.synopsis: Peg and Cat lend a hand when their pal Richard directs the Radio City Music Hall Blockettes; Peg and Cat play peacemakers between feuding neighbors.
episodes.title: The Blockette Problem / The Tulip Problem

episodes.synopsis: Peg and Cat search the mall for the teens so they can all enter a dance contest; Peg and Cat play marbles with Queen Cleopatra at the pyramids.
episodes.title: The Mega Mall Problem / The Cleopatra Problem

episodes.synopsis: Cat must figure out how to help Peg, who's stuck in a tree; Peg and Cat help their friend Romeo reach Juliet's balcony.
episodes.title: Yet Another Tree Problem / The Romeo and Juliet Problem

episodes.synopsis: The Arch Villain wreaks havoc on Mathtropolis by turning everything into arches; the Arch Villain goes on a rampage with straight-and-narrow shapes.
episodes.title: The Arch Villain Problem / The Straight and Narrow Problem

episodes.synopsis: Peg and Cat use music and patterns to help Beethoven and the Three Bears play together; Peg and Cat join the Knights of the Round Table.
episodes.title: The Play Date Problem / The Blabberwocky Problem

episodes.synopsis: Peg and Cat judge a singing competition; Peg and Cat try to help Richard realize his dream of being first in line for the first time.
episodes.title: The Perfect Ten Problem / The Long Line Problem

episodes.synopsis: Peg and Cat help Mac become a circus clown; Peg and Cat help find 15 missing cherry blossom trees.
episodes.title: The Ninja Problem / The Clown Problem
